title: Task 80

question.text: What can we conclude in terms of the amount of vegetarian food at the party?

answers.answer: Maria believes that there should be 5 trays of salad for the party
answers.feedback: She actually says that 3 would be enough.

answers.answer: She thinks 3 trays of salad are as much as the vegetarians in the team need
She will order 5 trays of salad along with the 3 they had decided to order

dialogue.text: And for the vegetarian options, you mentioned 5 large trays of salad, but I think 3 large trays is enough.
